info.description: Search engine optimization and social media sharing metadata

metaTitle.description: Page title for search results. Keep under 60 chars for best display.

metaDescription.description: Page description for search results. 50-160 chars recommended.

keywords.description: Comma-separated keywords for SEO (e.g., 'landing page, saas, product'). Optional.

metaImage.description: Social media preview image. Recommended: 1200x630px (Open Graph format).

canonicalURL.description: Canonical URL to prevent duplicate content issues. Usually auto-generated.

ogType.description: Open Graph type for social media sharing

noIndex.description: Prevent search engines from indexing this page (useful for staging)
